duties_responsibilities.duty: Plans and executes the implementation of SCCM and Intune for desktop imaging, software distribution, and patch management.
Leads the technical design, engineering, and support activities for desktop and server software distribution, and patch management.
Monitors and maintains SCCM/MECM and Intune system and client functionality, configuration, and health.
Manages AD objects and security groups as it relates to Software Distribution and Patch management.
Develops and maintains documentation related to SCCM and Intune infrastructure, configurations, and procedures.
Provides Tier-3 technical support and troubleshoots all aspects of SCCM/MECM issues related to client devices, supported servers, logs, and databases.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree from an accredited college or university in computer science, management information systems, business administration, or engineering and three years of progressively responsible information systems experience.
